channel.title: Packet information
channel.description:
This is a list of the packet ID's and their uses (For the 317 client). They're sorted into 'Client > Server' packets and 'Server > Client' packets.
[code]CLIENT > SERVER PACKETS:
Packet 0 - Length: 0; Packet Info: Sent when there are no actions being performed by the player. Packet 3 - Length: 1; Packet Info: Client window goes out of focus. Packet 4 - Length: N/A; Packet Info: Player chat message. Packet 14 - Length: 8; Packet Info: Player uses an item on another player. Packet 16 - Length: 6; Packet Info: Second item right-click option (Inventory). Packet 17 - Length: 2; Packet Info: Second NPC right-click option. Packet 21 - Length: 2; Packet Info: Third NPC right-click option. Packet 25 - Length: 12; Packet Info: Use an item with another item on the floor. Packet 39 - Length: 2; Packet Info: Player follow option. Packet 40 - Length: 2; Packet Info: NPC Dialogue clicking. Packet 41 - Length: 6; Packet Info: Item equipping. Packet 43 - Length: 6; Packet Info: Third item interface option (Bank 10, sell 5). Packet 53 - Length: 12; Packet Info: Use item with another item. Packet 60 - Length: 0; Packet Info: Enter a name. Packet 70 - Length: 6; Packet Info: Third object right-click option. Packet 72 - Length: 2; Packet Info: Attack NPC option. Packet 73 - Length: 2; Packet Info: Trade with another player. Packet 74 - Length: 8; Packet Info: Remove a player from the ignore list. Packet 75 - Length: 6; Packet Info: First item right-click option (Inventory & operate on equipment interface). Packet 79 - Length: 6; Packet Info: Sent when the player attempt to light logs. Packet 86 - Length: 4; Packet Info: Move the camera. Packet 87 - Length: 6; Packet Info: Drop item on the ground. Packet 95 - Length: 3; Packet Info: Change privacy options (e.g. Hide public chat). Packet 98 - Length: N/A; Packet Info: Walk to something when an action is performed (e.g. Click object, click NPC). Packet 101 - Length: 13; Packet Info: Character design. Packet 103 - Length: N/A; Packet Info: Player commands. Packet 117 - Length: 6; Packet Info: Second item interface option (Bank 5, sell one). Packet 121 - Length: 0; Packet Info: Sent when the client finishes loading a map region. Packet 122 - Length: 6; Packet Info: First item clicking object (e.g. Eat food, bury bones). Packet 126 - Length: N/A; Packet Info: Player sends a private message to another player. Packet 129 - Length: 6; Packet Info: Fourth item interface option (e.g. Bank all, sell 10). Packet 130 - Length: 0; Packet Info: Player closes an interface via the 'close window' button. Packet 131 - Length: 4; Packet Info: Use magic on NPC's. Packet 132 - Length: 6; Packet Info: First object right-click option. Packet 133 - Length: 8; Packet Info: Player adds a name to their ignore list. Packet 135 - Length: 6; Packet Info: Fifth item interface option (Bank X, sell all). Packet 139 - Length: 2; Packet Info: Answer trade request. Packet 145 - Length: 6; Packet Info: Unequip an item/Bank 1 item/Value shop item. Packet 155 - Length: 2; Packet Info: First NPC right-click option (Usually "talk"). Packet 164 - Length: N/A; Packet Info: Normal walking (Not via an action or map walking). Packet 181 - Length: 8; Packet Info: Use magic on items on the floor. Packet 185 - Length: 2; Packet Info: Button clicking. Packet 188 - Length: 8; Packet Info: Add a name to the friend list. Packet 192 - Length: 12; Packet Info: Use item on an object. Packet 202 - Length: 0; Packet Info: Sent when the player is idle for 4500ms. Packet 208 - Length: 4; Packet Info: Enter X amount. Packet 210 - Length: 4; Packet Info: Player enters a new map region. Packet 214 - Length: 7; Packet Info: Move an item from one slot to another. Packet 215 - Length: 8; Packet Info: Remove name from friend list. Packet 218 - Length: 10; Packet Info: Report another player. Packet 236 - Length: 6; Packet Info: Pick up item from the ground. Packet 237 - Length: 8; Packet Info: Use magic on an item. Packet 241 - Length: 4; Packet Info: Player clicks anywhere on the game screen. Packet 248 - Length: N/A; Packet Info: Map walking (Clicking on the map to walk). Packet 249 - Length: 4; Packet Info: Use magic on another player. Packet 252 - Length: 6; Packet Info: Second object right-click option. Packet 253 - Length: 6; Packet Info: First ground item right-click option (Not pick up).
SERVER > CLIENT PACKETS:
Packet 1 - Resets all animations in the immediate area. Packet 24 - Flash sidebar icons. Packet 27 - Open "Enter Amount" interface. Packet 34 - Write inventory items. Packet 35 - Shakes the screen (Used in earthquakes e.g. Barrows, monkey madness). Packet 36 - Set button states. Packet 44 - Creates an item on the ground. Packet 50 - Adds names to the friend/ignore interfaces. Packet 53 - Write item images to interface. Packet 60 - Removes an object. Packet 61 - Reset head icons. Packet 65 - NPC updating. Packet 68 - Turn off split private chat. Packet 70 - Sets the special bar fill amount and text. Packet 71 - Assigns an interface to one of the tabs in the game sidebar. Packet 73 - Loads a new map region. Packet 74 - Play music. Packet 75 - Set an NPC's face onto an interface. Packet 78 - Remove the flag from the minimap. Packet 79 - Sets the scrollbar position of an interface. Packet 81 - Update Players. Packet 85 - Sends the X and Y coordinates for creation of a graphic/object/item. Packet 87 - Adjust the valume. Packet 97 - Displays a normal interface. Packet 99 - Sets the mini map's state. Packet 101 - Deletes an object. Packet 104 - Sets the player right click menu options. Packet 106 - Forces the specified sidebar to show. Packet 107 - Resets the camera position. Packet 109 - Disconnects the client from the server. Packet 110 - Sends the players run energy level. Packet 114 - Sends how many seconds until a 'System Update.' Packet 117 - Creates a projectile. Packet 121 - Set music, used less. Packet 126 - Attaches text to an interface. Packet 134 - Sends a skill level to the client. Packet 142 - Write an interface over the inventory and remove sidebar icons. Packet 151 - Creates an object. Packet 156 - Removes item from the ground. Packet 164 - Sends a chatbox interface. Packet 166 - Toggle the camera. Packet 171 - Add special bar to interface. Packet 174 - Play a sound effect. Packet 176 - Displays the welcome screen. Packet 177 - Toggle camera view. Packet 185 - Set the player's face onto an interface. Packet 187 - Open "Enter Username" interface. Packet 196 - Sends a private message to another player. Packet 200 - Animate an entity's face on an interface. Packet 206 - Sends the chat options (e.g. Hide public chat). Packet 208 - Displays an interface in walkable mode. Packet 214 - Sends and hashes each player's name on the ignore list. Packet 218 - Write an interface over the chatbox. Packet 219 - Clears the screen of all open interfaces. Packet 221 - Friends list load status. Packet 240 - Sends the players weight amount. Packet 241 - Constructs a dynamic map region using a palette of 8*8 tiles. Packet 246 - Displays an item model inside an interface. Packet 248 - Attaches an interface within an interface. Packet 249 - Sends the player's membership status and their current index on the server's player list. Packet 253 - Sends a server message.[/code]

item.title: Packet information
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“MrPotatoHead, post:11, topic:335143”]Yeah, maybe you should check them again?
List of server->client packets that are missing or wrong (wrong number)

4 8 NO PACKET 24 - mistake - packet 4 maybe? 64 72 84 NO PACKET 85 105 122 147 160 215 230 254 [/quote]

Packet 24 is for making the sideicons ‘flash’.
Packet 85 is used in several other packets (ground item creating, removing, object creating, projectile creating).

Also, I didn’t say the list was full.

Read full topic

item.title: Packet information
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

The Soul:

All of these packets have already been documented…

Not all of them. I looked them up on RuneWiki and there’s at least 10 in my list that isn’t on there.

Read full topic

item.title: Packet information
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

kidzz12:

It’s so easy to dump these lol.

You can’t dump the uses.

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:2, topic:335143”]This is a very good list but please include the length and packet structure otherwise nobody will know how to use these packets.

I know it’s a lot to ask for but you should really contribute to http://runewiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317_Protocol[/quote]

I’ll try and get it done soon. I’m in the process of moving house so I don’t have much time at the moment :p.

Read full topic

item.title: Packet information
item.dc:creator: @kidzz12 kidzz12
item.description:
@kidzz12 wrote:

It’s so easy to dump these lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Packet information
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

This is a very good list but please include the length and packet structure otherwise nobody will know how to use these packets.

I know it’s a lot to ask for but you should really contribute to http://runewiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317_Protocol

Read full topic
